title: What are some songs sung in French by a young girl? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, Songs from the musical Emilie Jolie are quite nice. My 3 girls love to sing it, especially the ET song : La Chanson de l'Extra-terrestre - Philippe Chatel - Emilie Jolie - 1979 In a classical register Carmen include songs for group of kids… More challenging ! You also could get ideas from the “Kids united” group : they are about the age of your girl, and sing several songs as a group or individuals.
Not French, but in French, Céline Dion’s D’amour ou d’amitié. She was 15 when it was first aired in France, although she may look older.
